Name: Strawberry Fields
Ingredients: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: MUDDLE strawberry in base of shaker. Add vodka, honey syrup, lemon juice and egg white and SHAKE with ice. Strain back into shaker, DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into chilled glass.
Review: This refreshing vodka-based strawberry cocktail balances tart lemon juice with rich honey. Drops of balsamic and a dusting of black pepper add complexity.
Garnish: Five drops of balsamic vinegar and a dusting of freshly ground black pepper
